Question: Shenzhen Siyunxing Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Siyunxing Electronics Co., Ltd

Product: Tablet PC

- Full keyboard with comfortable design
- FHD screen with ultra-narrow border for wide viewing angles up to 178 degrees
- Specializes in developing, manufacturing, and selling Tablet PC, AIO PC, Notebook, Action Camera, and intelligent devices
- Monthly production capacity of at least 250K, offering OEM/ODM services
- Office located in Shenzhen Bao’an Fenghuang Zhigu, and factory located in Chang’an-Dongguan
- Values respect, cooperation, and innovation, aiming to provide safe products and services while ensuring employee development
- Core concept: improve value by quality and keep promise
- Customer-centric and market-oriented company
- Strong expertise in materials selection, mechanical design, assembling technology, and quality management & control system
